recipe.title: Piña Colada Ice Pops
ingredients: 1/2 cup well-stirred canned cream of coconut
8 (1/3-cup) ice pop molds and 8 wooden sticks
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender until smooth, then force through a fine sieve into a large glass measuring cup. Pour liquid into molds and add sticks. Freeze at least 24 hours.
